result.eng: It is two miles away from the house.

result.eng: I payed a half a thousand euro for this bicycle.

result.eng: Thank you very much. - Don't mention it.

result.html: Míle buíochasA million thanks!

result.eng: The shop is only half a mile from my house.

result.eng: She runs a mile every day.

result.eng: Thousands of people come year after year to take part in the festival.

result.eng: I live a few miles from Galway.

result.eng: This was done in Shannon Airport where you see thousands of American soldiers every day on their way to Iraq.

result.eng: As the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.
